word: G337 - ἀναιρέω - anairéō - an-ahee-reh'-o - Put to death

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கொலைசெய், மடிந்து போகவை, கொன்று போடு, நீக்கிப்போடு
to take up, to lift up, to take away, abolish

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G303 and (the active of) G138; to take up, that is, adopt; by implication to take away (violently), that is, abolish, murder: - put to death, kill, slay, take away, take up.
